Register.subject: Muonium - Account validation
Register.message:
Welcome to Muonium and thank you for your registration.
To validate your account, follow this link : https://photon.muonium.ch/neutron/Validate/Key/[id_user]/[key]
Best regards,
Muonium Team

Hi,
To update your password or secrete password, please follow this link : https://photon.muonium.ch/neutron/LostPass/Key/[id_user]/[key]
Best regards,
Muonium Team.

shortcuts: • Left click on a file/folder : Select a file/folder - View details
• Ctrl + Arrow up : Add previous file to selection
• Ctrl + Arrow down : Add next file to selection
